system.description:
As your psychic rage lashes out, you have learned to instinctually direct the bodies of those affected to heal and repair themselves. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you use Raging Projection to grant a creature temporary or rage hit points, instead of Mind Strike you may also use your Chirurgury power on the same target.
  • If you would be reduced to 0 hit points while raging, you may immediately use a reaction to target yourself with the Chirurgury power.
system.prerequisite: Nexus of Psionic Fury feat and chirugeon archetype
